attributes.action: Stop the £200 ENERGY LOAN FOR EVERY HOUSEHOLD IN ENGLAND
attributes.additional_details:
First time buyers who have not had the credit will pay for a loan that they did not have a credit for. 
It will impact on working class who have a mortgage to pay being pushed further towards the bread line. 
It will increase the long term cost of living and put more pressure on families.
attributes.background: In October every household will have £200 credit on their energy bill, this has to be paid back £40 a year for 5 years. I want this to be considered as a loan you can opt into not a loan for ever household. This stops homes who can afford to pay energy bills having a debt they do not need or want.
